name: commvault
label: Commvault
description: Commvault is an Intelligent Data Services platform which helps you close the business integrity gap, keeping your data available and ready for business growth. This connector facilitates operations to get alerts, get and update the user details.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The service-based URL to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username to access the Commvault server to which you will connect and perform actions.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password to access the Commvault server to which you will connect and perform actions.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of alerts from the Commvault server.
operations.title: Get Alerts List

operations.description: Retrieves details about a specific alert from Commvault based on the alert ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Alert Details

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.description: The ID of the alert whose details you want to retrieve from Commvault

operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of users from the Armis server based on filters like Alert ID
operations.title: Get Users List

parameters.title: Level
parameters.name: level
parameters.tooltip: Select the level to control the user properties included in the response based on your selection.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Select the level to control the user properties included in the response based on your selection from the following options: 
10 - User properties such as the description and email address. 
30 - Additional user properties such as quota information. 
40 - associated internal and external user groups, security associations, and the user properties returned by level 30. 
50 - users who can manage the user and the information returned by level 40

operations.description: Updates the properties of a specific user on the Commvault server based on the user ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Update User Details

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose details you want to update.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A general description of the user account which needs to be updated.

parameters.title: Associated User Groups Operation Type
parameters.name: associatedUserGroupsOperationType
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the user group in the user group name element.

parameters.title: Age Password Days
parameters.name: agePasswordDays
parameters.description: Specify the number of days to keep the password active.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Specify updated password of the user to access the user account.

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the user which needs to be updated.

parameters.title: Full Name
parameters.name: fullName
parameters.description: The full name of the user which needs to be updated.

parameters.title: Enable User
parameters.name: enableUser
parameters.description: Specify whether to enable/disable the user. By default the user is active.
parameters.tooltip: The option to enable/disable the user.

parameters.title: User Group Names
parameters.name: userGroupNames
parameters.tooltip: Please provide comma separated user group names
parameters.description: The name of the user group operated on by the associated user groups operation type element.

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Specify the name of the user which needs to be updated.
